de.unisiegen.tpml.core.typechecker
Class DefaultTypeSubstitution

java.lang.Object
  de.unisiegen.tpml.core.typechecker.DefaultTypeSubstitution
All Implemented Interfaces:
TypeSubstitution
final class DefaultTypeSubstitution
extends Object
implements TypeSubstitution

Default implementation of the TypeSubstitution interface. This is an internal class of the type checker. If you need to generate new substitutions outside the generic type checker implementation, use the TypeUtilities.newSubstitution(TypeVariable, MonoType) method instead.

Version:
$Rev: 296 $
Author:
Benedikt Meurer
See Also:
TypeSubstitution

Field Summary
static DefaultTypeSubstitution EMPTY_SUBSTITUTION
          The empty type substitution, which does not contain any mappings.
 
Constructor Summary
DefaultTypeSubstitution()
          Allocates a new empty DefaultTypeSubstitution.
DefaultTypeSubstitution(TypeVariable tvar, MonoType type)
          Convenience wrapper for the DefaultTypeSubstitution(TypeVariable, MonoType, DefaultTypeSubstitution) constructor, which passes EMPTY_SUBSTITUTION for the parent parameter.
DefaultTypeSubstitution(TypeVariable tvar, MonoType type, DefaultTypeSubstitution parent)
          Allocates a new DefaultTypeSubstitution which represents a pair (tvar,type) and chains up to the specified parent.
 
Method Summary
 DefaultTypeSubstitution compose(TypeSubstitution s)
          Returns the composition of this TypeSubstitution and s.
 Set<TypeVariable> free()
          Returns the set of free type variables in this TypeSubstitution, that is the free identifiers in all types present in this substitution.
 MonoType get(TypeVariable tvar)
          Returns the monomorphic type that is specified for the given tvar in this substitution or the tvar itself if no other type is specified for the tvar.

EMPTY_SUBSTITUTION

public static final DefaultTypeSubstitution EMPTY_SUBSTITUTION
The empty type substitution, which does not contain any mappings.

See Also:
DefaultTypeSubstitution()
Constructor Detail

DefaultTypeSubstitution

DefaultTypeSubstitution()
Allocates a new empty DefaultTypeSubstitution.

See Also:
TypeSubstitution#EMPTY_SUBSTITUTION

DefaultTypeSubstitution

DefaultTypeSubstitution(TypeVariable tvar,
                        MonoType type)
Convenience wrapper for the DefaultTypeSubstitution(TypeVariable, MonoType, DefaultTypeSubstitution) constructor, which passes EMPTY_SUBSTITUTION for the parent parameter.

Parameters:
tvar - the type variable.
type - the (concrete) monomorphic type to substitute for tvar.
Throws:
NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null.

DefaultTypeSubstitution

DefaultTypeSubstitution(TypeVariable tvar,
                        MonoType type,
                        DefaultTypeSubstitution parent)
Allocates a new DefaultTypeSubstitution which represents a pair (tvar,type) and chains up to the specified parent.

Parameters:
tvar - the type variable.
type - the (concrete) monomorphic type to substitute for tvar.
parent - the parent substitution to chain up to.
Throws:
NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null.
Method Detail

compose

public DefaultTypeSubstitution compose(TypeSubstitution s)
Returns the composition of this TypeSubstitution and s. The composition will apply pairs from this substitution first and afterwards the ones from s.

Specified by:
compose in interface TypeSubstitution
Parameters:
s - another TypeSubstitution.
Returns:
the composition of this and s.
See Also:
TypeSubstitution.compose(de.unisiegen.tpml.core.typechecker.TypeSubstitution)

free

public Set<TypeVariable> free()
Returns the set of free type variables in this TypeSubstitution, that is the free identifiers in all types present in this substitution.

Specified by:
free in interface TypeSubstitution
Returns:
the set of free type variables.
See Also:
TypeSubstitution.free()

get

public MonoType get(TypeVariable tvar)
Returns the monomorphic type that is specified for the given tvar in this substitution or the tvar itself if no other type is specified for the tvar.

Specified by:
get in interface TypeSubstitution
Parameters:
tvar - the type variable for which to lookup the type to substitute.
Returns:
the substituted type for the tvar or the tvar itself if no type is registered for the type variable.
See Also:
TypeSubstitution.get(de.unisiegen.tpml.core.types.TypeVariable)
